3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness. Floors are distinct planes. Interior volume is clearly perceivable. Proper 3D wall corner geometry. Angled isometric-like view with interior visible from elevated perspective. Minimal perspective distortion. Roof is cleanly removed and interior spaces are fully visible. Clean geometry with no broken sections.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms and adjacency relationships are mostly preserved, though the 'Entrance to the House' area is less defined in the 3D. Relative room proportions are well-preserved. Major room identities match. Major wall positions align perfectly with 2D plan and wall lengths are proportional. Internal partitions are mostly correctly placed. The toilet room and wash area are accurately reproduced. Doors are present and on correct walls, opening directions match in most cases. Windows are present and on correct walls and are proportionally sized and oriented.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) are present and in correct rooms. Kitchen elements (sink, stove, counter) are present, as are bathroom fixtures (toilet, sink, shower). Furniture is generally placed correctly and at a reasonable scale relative to the room, with logical orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable, and the geometry is readable. Interior is clearly visible with good lighting that does not obscure geometry. Consistent material usage, no major rendering artifacts or broken meshes. Clean background with no text labels.

summary: This is an excellent and highly faithful 3D conversion of the 2D floor plan, demonstrating strong geometric accuracy, clear 3D fundamentals, and good visual clarity.
